title: Didot-ish? ID Help ...
content:
Hi all,  
Can anyone identify this typeface? Looks very similar to Didot, but you can certainly tell it is not by the italics.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106084133im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2919391111_d825d1b698_5064.jpg)
author: moggy

comments.content: It's a little tough to say with the skew of the image, but I'd have to agree with Akira. Most likely the 96 Medium weight.
